transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Namaste sir.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Tulsian Healthcare Private Limited mein baat ho rahi hai mam?
Customer: Ji mam.
Executive: Mam, namaskar. Main IndiaMART ki team se baat kar rahi hu. Priyanka naam hai mam mera. Bas do minute aapse lungi.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Mam, hume bas ek concern receive hua tha aapke through ki inquiries ka kuch wo hai, less we are getting less inquiries.
Customer: Yes mam.
Executive: You know, to aap mujhe thoda sa batao mam, kuch location ka limitation hai ki specific kisi location mein deal kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Nahi, pan India mein deal kar rahe hai mam, location koi wo nahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, mam aawaz nahi aa rahi hai kya?
Executive: Aawaz break ho rahi hai mam, abhi aa rahi hai, bataye mam.
Customer: Mam, pan India mein kaam karte hai hum.
Executive: To aapko pan India inquiries nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ji, yes mam, nahi aa rahi hai.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello, mam aawaz aa rahi hai. Mam main call back karu? Main call back kar rahi hu. Main call back.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving enough inquiries.

- Wants to know if location limitation is the reason.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed customer deals pan India.

- Executive offered to call back due to voice issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, location, call back

seller_categories.mcat_name: Dr Morepen Blood Glucose Test Strips
